sens.mc: an ambitious person who eagerly goes after what is desired
sens.vi: a go-getter with his sights set on the presidency
sens.syn: bootstrapper, go-ahead, highflier (or highflyer), hummer, hustler, live wire, powerhouse, rustler, self-starter
sens.rel: eager beaver; achiever, comer, doer, enterpriser; he-man, individualist
sens.near: dawdler, idler, loafer, lounger, putterer, trifler; goldbrick, malingerer, procrastinator, shirker, slacker; drone, lazybones, sluggard; dallier, laggard, lingerer, loiterer, slowpoke, stick-in-the-mud; ignorer, ne'er-do-well, neglecter; daydreamer, dreamer; dropout, quitter
